name: H=N=CO=Doodle
description:
_______H=N=CO=Doodle __________
This (meta)interactive OBJKT enables playful participatory design activities: Collaborative Doodling in realtime 3D. Visitors are invited to contribute and create by sketching, drawing, scribbling, and exploring these collaborative CO=Doodles. By collecting and holding this OBJKT visitors can unlock a color mode to enjoy a full immersion in colorful Doodles. As these collaborative Doodles are only visible as long as a visitor is online, H=N=CO=Doodle enables and displays everchanging realtime content inside a cleanNFT. Hic et Nunc=Here and Now=H=N=CO=Doodle
 
_______CO-Doodle Navigation__________
How to Draw a Line: LeftClickHold + Move  
Move: [w, a, s, d]
Move up/down: [q, e]
Rotate View: [RightClickHold + move Mouse in direction]
Speed up/down: Scroll MouseWheel up/down

*******UNLOCK Color Mode*******
Unlock the Color Mode by collecting&holding this OBJKT.
Display Color Doodle: [v] 
Change Color Set: [b] 
White Doodle Mode: [n]
***************************************

_______Display Functions__________
Show Doodle-Creator Names: [m] on/off
Animate Doodle: [u] 
Hide PlayerSpheres: [c] on/off
_________________ 
by Alexander Grasser, 2021 @grasser_alex alexandergrasser.com 
A follow-up of project ARGraffiti with Alexandra Parger at Wien Museum 2018.#collaborativeobjects #realtimearchitecture #architecturemachine
